sentences.en: Beds on both sides of the room were laden with corpse - like figures.
sentences.cn: 两边的几张木板床上摆了一些死尸似的身体.

sentences.en: Breathing asbestos - laden air may be hazardous to health.
sentences.cn: 呼吸充满了石棉的空气可能对健康有害.

sentences.en: Dragging the fully laden boat across the sand dunes was no mean feat.
sentences.cn: 将满载货物的船拖过沙丘是一件了不起的事.

sentences.en: He breathes the sweet - laden night air and smells the earth.
sentences.cn: 他吸了一口芳香飘溢的夜晚的空气,闻到了泥土的气息.

sentences.en: He is laden with heavy responsibility.
I came home laden with cardboard boxes.
sentences.cn: 我抱着一大堆纸箱回了家。

sentences.en: Many of their heavy industries are laden with debt.
sentences.cn: 他们的重工业很多负债累累。

sentences.en: Standing up, he unbuckled his belt, and spread it laden across his waist.
sentences.cn: 他站了起来, 解开腰带, 带子的一头垂到腰部以下.

sentences.en: The bushes were laden with fruit.
The rickety little waggon was already laden.
sentences.cn: 那辆摇摇晃晃的货车,已经装好了车子.

sentences.en: The table was laden with maps, charts, and books.
sentences.cn: 台上放满了地图 、 航海图和书.

sentences.en: This morning, laden with full equipment, he looked scarcely human.
sentences.cn: 这天早晨, 他背着全部设备, 看起来很不象个样儿.

sentences.en: Two mules well laden with packs were trudging along.
sentences.cn: 两头骡子驮着沉重的背包,吃力地往前走.

trans.tran_cn: 满载的，负载的，受压迫的
trans.tran_en: heavily loaded with something, or containing a lot of something
